title: The most stirring portrayal of love and humanity.
review: This is one of the greatest portrayals of utter love, and then sacrifice for love. Bogey is the ultimate as far as a man being hardened by lost love, but softened with compassion for others in similar situations. Some of the best quotes in the movies are found in Casablanca such as 'Here's looking at you kid', 'This looks like the beginning of a wonderful friendship', and the classic 'Play it Sam...'
